nodes.bodyText: This verbiage is directly from the official MoH. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Medal_of_Honor.  Because of the significance of this award and the respect it deserves, even in a game version, I decided not to change its requirements.  There's only 80 living recipients and 3,500 given out since the Civil War.  There are 1.3 million active members of the US armed forces.  Though I'm concerned about it being taken for granted in a game, I decided to include it for those that have a backstory to tell about one of there characters that would be appropriate.  For this to be earned in-game, someone needs to run a Wasp into the middle of an enemy company to pick up an ejected Mechwarrior, lose a mech limb while being personally injured, and still drop 4 enemy units before successfully escaping to safety.  Something absurd, like rolling 12's four times in a roll with 2D6.
